channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- SRS Policy Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- SRS Policy Manager

item.title: CVE-2021-21517|2024-09-17T00:25:38.048Z -- dell -- srs%20policy%20manager
item.description: SRS Policy Manager 6.X is affected by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) vulnerability due to a misconfigured XML parser that processes user-supplied DTD input without sufficient validation. A remote unauthenticated attacker can potentially exploit this vulnerability to read system files as a non-root user and may be able to temporarily disrupt the ESRS service.
